alert.note: Alert for Eastern Aleutians (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 18 at 5:26AM AKDT until March 19 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 AM AKDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Visibilities reduced to one half mile or less at times. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Northerly winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Aleutians. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 10 AM AKDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers, heavy at times, will develop this morning and continue through Saturday morning. Visibility will fluctuate up and down over short periods of time due to variability in shower and wind intensity.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
